text: Carmen Montejo (María Teresa Sánchez González; May 26, 1925 - February 25, 2013) was an Cuban-Mexican actress. She was known for her many television shows. She was one of the last surviving actresses of the Golden Age of Cinema of Mexico. Montejo was born on May 26, 1925 in Pinar del Río, Cuba. She was married to Manuel González Ortega until his death. Montejo died on February 25, 2013 in Mexico City, Mexico from an illness, aged 87.Carmen Montejo dies at 87 at novelasyseries.com ==References== ==Other websites== * Carmen Montejo at the telenovela database * Carmen Montejo at esmas.com * Category:1925 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Cuban actors Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican radio actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors
title: Carmen Montejo
